body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Depot's customer service. My name is Walter Powell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Denise Harris.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Denise. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad because I need to return a product I bought.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Denise. Can you please provide me with your order number and the reason for the return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my order number is five six seven eight and I need to return the item because it arrived damaged.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Denise. I will process your return request immediately. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Denise. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
